name: ECharts

aliases.name: PieChartOption
aliases.comment: describe the chart option of pie chart
aliases.type: { title : Maybe.Maybe { show : Bool, text : String, subtext : String, left : String } , tooltip : Maybe.Maybe { show : Bool, formatter : String } , legend : Maybe.Maybe { show : Bool , orient : ECharts.Orientation , left : String , data : List String } , series : List ECharts.PieSeries }

aliases.name: PieSeries
aliases.comment: describe the data series of pie chart
aliases.type: { name : String , radius : ( String, String ) , center : ( String, String ) , data : List { value : Float, name : String } , itemStyle : { emphasis : { shadowBlur : Int , shadowOffsetX : Int , shadowColor : String } } }

values.name: toJsonString
values.comment:
convert the chart option to a string of json, which could apply to the
[echart-webcomponent] (https://github.com/kkpoon/echarts-webcomponent) `option`
attribute
